casebody.data:
SCOVILL MANUFACTURING COMPANY, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. SAGAMOR METAL GOODS CORPORATION, Defendant-Appellee. No. 47. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Nov. 5, 1934. Philipp, Sawyer, Rice & Kennedy, of New York City (H. Monroe Humason, of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Frank J. Kent and Cl) arles F. Chisholm, both of New York City, for appellee.

Before MANTON, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree affirmed.
